title: Rebuild app from HTML source with complete implementation

requirements.text: Parse and implement the complete HTML app structure from the user-provided source code, preserving all sections, styling patterns, and interaction behaviors defined in the original markup

quotes:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>For My Best Friend ðŸ’–</title>

acceptanceCriteria: All sections defined in the HTML source are implemented as React components
CSS styling from the HTML <style> block is converted to Tailwind classes or custom CSS matching the original visual design
All JavaScript functionality from the HTML source is implemented in React hooks and components
The app structure and navigation flow matches the HTML implementation

requirements.text: Apply the Comic Sans MS font family as specified in the HTML source to maintain the cute, friendly aesthetic throughout the app
acceptanceCriteria: Comic Sans MS is loaded and applied as the primary font
A fallback cursive font is provided for systems without Comic Sans MS

requirements.text: Implement the gradient background using the exact colors from the HTML source: linear gradient from #ffc0cb (pink) to #ff99cc (hot pink) from top-left to bottom-right
acceptanceCriteria: Background gradient matches the HTML source colors exactly
Gradient direction is top-left to bottom-right
Background covers the entire viewport without horizontal scrolling

requirements.text: Implement the section display logic from the HTML source where sections are hidden by default (display:none) and shown individually based on navigation state
acceptanceCriteria: Only one section is visible at a time
Each section has consistent padding of 50px vertical and 20px horizontal
Sections have appropriate minimum height as defined in the HTML source

requirements.text: Extract and implement all interactive features, content, and user flows defined in the complete HTML source code that was truncated in the user message
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons, inputs, and interactive elements from the HTML are functional
All content sections (greetings, instructions, feature areas) are rendered
Navigation between screens works as defined in the HTML
All event handlers and dynamic behaviors are preserved

constraints: Do not change the backend architecture (single-actor Motoko)

Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Use only React, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn, and React Query for frontend implementation
Maintain the existing light/dark theme system while applying the new gradient background
nonGoals: Adding Google Play Store publishing or PWA/TWA wrapper functionality
Changing the existing feature set beyond what the HTML source specifies
Adding backend data persistence (continue using localStorage as per HTML)
Integrating third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity
